bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Testing and Performance for Optical Ground Wire (OPGW) for Use on Electric Utility Power Lines
IEEE Draft Standard for Testing and Performance for Optical Ground Wire (OPGW) for Use on Electric Utility Power Lines

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The performance, test requirements, procedures, and acceptance criteria for a transmission line overhead ground wire (a.k.a. shield wire, static wire, earth wire, skywire) with optical fibers commonly known as optical ground wire (OPGW) are covered. Functional requirements, such as electrical, mechanical, optical fiber, environmental, and packaging, and test requirements related to design, installation, in-service, and maintenance, including routine tests, are covered.
